title: Announcing the Burning Man Ticket Transfer Tool!
author: Burning Man Project
content:
Weâ€™re beyond excited to introduce you to the new self-serve Ticket Transfer tool, available through your Ticketfly account. Ticket Transfer allows you to assign any transfer-eligible ticket or vehicle pass in a Will Call order to a specific person. With Ticket Transfer:

Hooray! You can find full details and instructions here.
